awd_titl_txt: Kansas Research and Education Network (KANREN) Enhancement  Funding Request
awd_abstract_narration: 9420711  Niebaum    This award adds sever higher education institutions to the KANREN  state network:         Community Colleges:            Fort Scott Community College            Hutchinson Community College            Kansas City Kansas Community College         Other Colleges and Universities:            Central College            Donnely College                 Friends University            Hesston College    Faculty and students at the new institutions join the existing  KANREN institutions in benefitting from access to the resources of  the Internet, including libraries and supercompuers.  In addition,  they are able to communicate and collaborate with colleagues at  other campuses in pursuit of research and educational projects.   The award provides partial support of the project for two years.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
